values:
You're not worth the pain. 
It's a bold faced lie but something has to make this go away.
Somethings got to give sometime.







For some reason I just can't shut it off.
Tell me fucking how.

"you had to know that I was fod of you
fond of y-ou"



yeah you.



right thrughthe fingers, ahoy.












drinkigns bringing ottu the worst ine me anymore.

welp, here goes my first entry.

I have so much to say and hope to get it out in this one little blank box.  Good luck to me.

    Growing up is hard to do, you know?  When you were a kid you wanted it all, the money the cars, and houses.  Everything seemed to be so easy to get in that child's eye.  Now that everything is real, it is making everything else  just as  difficult to obtain.  Allow me to elaborate. 
    While on the climb up the ladder to work towards getting an apt, working two jobs and maintaining a healthy social life is becoming harder and harder.   I am one to think that you should play well harder than you work.  I know that this is not the proper way to think at twenty two, but such is life and I really do believe i am set in my ways.  If you do not pay attention to life, it passes right before you're eyes and you'll end up missing out.  This past summer I have figured out what i want to do for the rest of my life and i have never been happier to work as hard as I need to to get to the final goal.

A big first step in the right direction.

    I have six years of schooling left to go through and I have no qualms with that.  Alot of my friends right now are eager to get out off school and start life.  Yes, i do wish the same for myself, but i also know that the position i am in right now is a hole i have dug for myself due to the, 'play harder' theory I have set for myself.  I am ok with being done school at the age of 27.  Well, maybe not ok, but it will set me up in a time in my life where I will be happy to start a new career and chapter for that matter.

    Did i mention what I want to go back to school for?  No? Well I want to be and elementary school art teacher.  I have my associates in photography and digital media from the newly formed 'Wilmington University'.  After completing that adventure I realized I have a severe passion for photography, but just in a free lance aspect of the field.  I have spent much of my life in love with journalism and photo journalism and thought to go back for my degree in that.  I thought harder about it and couldn't come up with any idea of what this girl could do with herself.  

Again here is where my theory comes into play. 

    Sitting on the deck at our shore spot, I was drinking all day long talking to my mother about what I was going to do.   After going through all of the jobs I had tortured myself with over the years we began talking to a long time friend.  She is a grade school teacher downstate in Dewey and was actually my first grade teacher.  She loves her job.  I, at one time in my life, was a kindergarten teacher in the mornings and loved every second. 

Then it hit me:
    Why not teach kids the one passion i have always had?

I got superly, overly, drunkenly excited.


So, over all I have been happy in getting to where I am right now.  I suppose.

    Sadly, I have felt the overwhelming need to find someone to share all of this with.  Most of you who care enough to read this probably get the jist of who i am and where i stand when it comes to relationships.  No?  I'm sorry, i don't know how to explain this with clear, un-creepy words. 

I just get lonely in the fall.  And after going through what I just went through, i just want something simple.  Nothing heavy.

Something honest.

BLAHBLAHBLAHBLAHBLAHBLAHBLAHBLAHBLAHBLAHBLAHBLAHBLAHBLAHBLAHBLAHBLAHBLAHBLAHBLAHBLAHBLAHBLAH

    So, I move in hopefully tomorrow!  Everything seems to be in order and i really like the people at the new complex.  Josh and I should be happy.  I just cannot wait to get out and start something new for myself.  Even just for a little bit.   I'm bringing Ziggy with me too.  That excites me.  I thought I was going to have give him away.  

Alrighty, i have a long day ahead off me tomorrow and should be shovin' off.


g'nite moon.
